comment: Abe chutiye , tere desh ki haalat dekh pehle .. bhikari aa jaate hai kahi pe muh maarne
amr:
# ::snt Abe chutiye , tere desh ki haalat dekh pehle .. bhikari aa jaate hai kahi pe muh maarne
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-temporally-at-91
            :ARG2 (c / chuti))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (d / desh
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (h / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG2 -)
            :op3 (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (p / person)
                  :ARG2 (l / laugh-01)
                  :ARG3 (e / equal)
                  :ARG4 (l2 / loud))
            :op4 h
            :ARG1 (b2 / bhikari)
            :ARG2 -)
      :op5 (k / kahi
            :mode expressive)
      :op6 h
      :ARG1 (m2 / maarne)
      :ARG2 -)

comment: Kya bol rahe ho be godse ki aulad deash drohi Aur do sale modi ko vote
amr:
# ::snt Kya bol rahe ho be godse ki aulad deash drohi Aur do sale modi ko vote
(a / and
      :op1 (a2 / ask-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / string-entity
                  :value "Bol"
                  :mod (r / rahe))
            :ARG2 y)
      :op2 (a3 / ask-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (s2 / string-entity
                  :value "aulad deash drohi")
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Aulad")))
      :op3 (a4 / ask-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (s3 / string-entity
                  :value "aulad deash drohi")
            :ARG2 p)
      :op4 (a5 / ask-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (s4 / string-entity
                  :value "mod ( modi-ko"))
      :ARG2 (v / vote-01))

comment: Usi samay agar pilot allah u akbar chillaye to use muslim terrorism kehna sahi banta hai
amr:
# ::snt Usi samay agar pilot allah u akbar chillaye to use muslim terrorism kehna sahi banta hai
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / we)
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / pilot-01))
            :ARG1 (a / allah
                  :mode expressive)
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Akbar")))
      :snt3 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / terrorism
                  :mod (r / religious-group
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Muslim")))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (k / kehna
                              :mode expressive)
                        :op2 (s2 / sahi
                              :mode expressive)
                        :op3 (b / banta
                              :mode expressive)))))

comment: Aur agar turbulance me koi A.H.U bolega to sabki fat jayagi ...
amr:
# ::snt Aur agar turbulance me koi A.H.U bolega to sabki fat jayagi ...
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-mod-91
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "A.H."
                              :op2 "U"))
                  :ARG2 (t / turbulance))
            :op2 (h2 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o / organization
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "A.H."
                                          :op2 "U"))
                              :ARG2 (m / member))))
            :op3 (h4 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sabki
                        :ARG1-of (f / fat-03)))
            :op4 (h5 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (j / jayagi)))
      :ARG2 p)
